状态包指令
05 00 00 00 27 00 01 00 0B 20 20 10 23 16 03 59 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 01 00 FF 07
数据包指令
05 00 00 00 64 00 01 00 0A 20 20 10 23 16 03 59 00 00 00 04 00 02 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 08 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 08 00 
00 00 00 00 00 00 08 01 00 00 00 04 00 00 00 04 00 00 00 04 00 00 00 04 00 00 00 04 00 02 00 02 00 00 00 04 01 00 00 
00 00 00 00 00 08 00 00 00 04 01 00 00 00 04 00 00 00 04 00 00 07
//****************ESP8266指令******************//
AT+SAVETRANSLINK=1,"111.13.124.1",61611,"TCP",2			//保存开机进入透传模式+IP+COM+type+<TCP keep alive-n*500ms>
AT+CWJAP_DEF="mFi_05F4DD","xfwy1369"					//连接 AP，并保存到 flash
